attributes.additional_details: The Government should carry out a full, independent review of the standard of PIP assessments conducted by Atos.
attributes.background: I am an ex Atos disability assessor with evidence, factual and anecdotal of the constantly covered problems, associated with the work of Atos on the PIP contract. Neither Atos, nor the DWP seem to think this warrants a response. I feel that anyone having to deal with Atos would argue the opposite.
